data.name: Krimzon hoard
data.detailed_description:
Experience a frenetically paced wave based hoard game, Play the one room challenge mode to learn the gun skills and surviving to high rounds and then Explore and find your way through the multiple levels of the campaign. Fight ever increasing waves of various enemies using various weapons, Keep your ammo and health high to improve your change of making it through.

  • Character Skills

    Improve your characters skills. Ammo, Health, Armour and weapon damage are all available to allocate your skill crystals to. You decide the best way to survive.

  • Game Stage

    Each wave of enemies gets harder and faster, You have to keep on top of your skills.

  • Game modes

    Campaign and One room challenge.

  • one room challenge

    Play in a single enclosed room designed to keep you in the action constantly. You can leave the one room challenge and then continue from the last fully completed wave some other time. However you only get one life.

  • Campaign

    Play through the labyrinth like levels opening doors and triggering switches to you’re your way out, all the while being chased down by the waves of every increasing enemies. Use as many lives as you need, However your final score on the leader boards is dependent on the level, wave and number of deaths.

  • Weapons

    Collect the many weapons and ammo that are dropped from the creatures or loot containers to stay on top of the enemy waves.

  • Leader Boards

    Both the campaign and each of the one room challenge levels have there own leader boards so you can track your performance against the rest of the community.

  • Achievable achievements

    Nothing stupid here, put the time in and you can get there.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0Ghz or faster multi core.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL, GeForce 8800, Radeon HD 4200
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Not compatible with Intel Series 4 Integrated Graphics Chip-sets. Or the Intel HD integrated Chip Sets. **Whilst the game supports controllers I strongly recommend using mouse and keyboard.
